name: Dinner Tonight: Shrimp in Crazy Water
description: I’m apparently still obsessed with death, because I can’t put My Last Supper down. I mean, of all recommendations, wouldn’t a “last-recipe-ever” tag by a respected chef seem like a good place to start? Especially when the chef is Mario...

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the oil into a large pot and turn the heat to medium. Dump in the onion, garlic, serranos, and fennel. Cook for 8 minutes or so, until softened.
Pour in the crushed tomatoes, wine, water, and salt. Bring to a boil, and then reduce to a simmer. Cook for 10 minutes.
Add the shrimp. Cook for another 5 minutes, until done.
